# Protectionism in context {background-color="#62259D"}




## Protectionism in context

<br>


There are basically [three arguments]{.hi-purple} in support of using [tariffs]{.note} as a trade barrier:

<br>

. . .

1. The [infant industry]{.hi} argument;

2. The [anti-dumping]{.hi-pink} argument;

3. The [environmental protection]{.hi-green} argument.


## Protectionism in context

<br>


[[1]]{.note}:  The [infant industry]{.hi} argument:

. . .

<br>


- [Block]{.note} imports for a limited time;

- Establish a [mature]{.note} industry;

- Relax restrictions and [compete]{.note} internationally.
